typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SQLNSRRecursive as string,
		SQLNSRCreateTable as string,
		SQLNSRCopyMode as string,
		SQLNSRFileFilter as string,
		SQLNSRArray as (Folder as string, table as string)[],
		UpsertEnable as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/SQLNSRRecursive'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> sink1
